definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Humus soil is the best culture substrate for Chinese pine.
sentences.chinese: 腐殖质土是培育油松苗的很好基质。

sentences.english: The female sterile clone 28 is aborted because of the failure development in the female gametophyte.
sentences.chinese: 油松28号不育系是因雌配子体发育停滞所致。

sentences.english: It indicated that the impact of the quality of maternal plants on generating sprout shoots was significant.
sentences.chinese: 说明母株的质量对油松萌芽枝的发生有明显影响。

sentences.english: Pinus tabulaeformis is the main afforestation tree in Huhhot City.
sentences.chinese: 油松是呼和浩特市市树。

sentences.english: However, the growth of the Pinus trees is prevailingly constrained by shortage of water.
sentences.chinese: 但是，由于缺水，油松的生长经常受到严重制约。

sentences.english: The hydrologic effects of 30-year old natural Chinese pine forests have been measured.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了30年生油松天然林的水文效应。

sentences.english: The result shows that precipitation is the major factor that affects the seedling stand precent of Chinese pine in air-seeding.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，降水过程是影响飞播油松成苗的主要因素。

definition: Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
poplar tree/various trees of genus Populus
Catalpa bungei or Manchurian Catalpa, a tea plant
